scripts.install:all: npm run install:root && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.build:all: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:server" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run start:client"
scripts.clean:server: cd server && npx rimraf node_modules dist tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
scripts.clean:client: cd client && npx rimraf node_modules dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:root && npm run clean:server && npm run clean:client
scripts.install:build:seed:start: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run seed && npm run start:all
scripts.clean:install:build:seed:start: npm run clean:all && npm run install:build:seed:start
scripts.dev:start:all: concurrently "npm run dev:start:server" "wait-on tcp:3001 && npm run dev:start:client"
scripts.dev:install:build:start: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run dev:start:all
scripts.dev:clean:install:build:start: npm run clean:all && npm run dev:install:build:start
scripts.free:render-build: npm run install:all && npm run build:all
